overview.en: DPC is a distributed blockchain industry technology innovation collaborative service platform. It is committed to using financial technology to establish a mutual trust mechanism between investors, technology innovation projects, supervisory institutions and third-party professional service organizations represented by blockchains. Give full play to the wisdom of the community and work together to create a self-disciplined, autonomous, transparent and open blockchain ecosystem.
overview.zh: DPC是一个分布式区块链行业科技创新协同服务平台，致力用金融科技手段建立投资者、以区块链为代表的科技创新型项目、监督机构以及第三方专业服务机构之间的互信机制，发挥社区群众的智慧， 共同营造自律、自治、透明、公开的区块链生态系统。
